name: Snappy
description:
This is a game you can play with any a bunch of friends just using your phone camera. It is a great party game when you are traveling or just bored waiting for a bus and want to pass time.

Rules:

Everybody playing picks a movie, music, or other using the random theme suggestor.  Once they have settled for a topic they show this topic to the player on the right without revealing it to others. 

Once you know your topic you need to take a picture that describes it. You are not allowed to draw, or write anything. You need to find something in your environment that photograph. You are allowed to use one of your hands or feet as a prop if necessary. 

When everyone has taken a picture then everyone in turn will try to guess what was the original topic. For each correct answer the photographer gets 1 point. After everyones picture has been guessed then points are counted and the one with most points win. If you are less than 4 people, you can play several rounds before counting.
